website_summaries.verdict: A smaller off-road monster truck (1:20 scale) with 4WD that can reach speeds of up to 18 mph under optimal conditions.
pros: This truck handles well, moves fast, and has an impressive battery life
With high-performance metal shocks, it is built to handle rough terrain, and knobby tires allow it to work on the beach
cons: The truck is 1:20 scale, meaning it’s only about 7 inches long
However, the diminutive size gives it a speed and battery life advantage over larger RC cars

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Well built. Small and fast.
customer_reviews.text: I was taken back when I pulled the rc out and it was so small, About 4 inches tall. This had no effect on how fun and well built it is. It is fast and easy to learn. Only negatives for me are the top speed and battery time are less than what the box it comes is says, so the listing is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Ward

customer_reviews.title: Signal
customer_reviews.text: Went through diagnostics and they told me to talk to you. I got this RC truck for “Santa” present for my kiddo and he was very excited about it. We tried it inside first and for the first time for 10-30 seconds the signal cuts out every time, 2 feet in front of us. We tried multiple times and after a huge disappointment it just keeps loosing signal. I’ve spent a half a day today trying all sorts of things to get it going for my kid to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service RC car didn't work extended warranty bought and they still didn't help
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible. My son was able to use it one time he went to charge it an it charged but it wouldn't turn on any more it wold not move I contacted the sales and they said and me a video and that is that I bought the extended warranty for what I payed I expected more. My little boy is a sad and upset he was so exited when he received it and when he went to play with after charging he was heart broke in tears. And when I contacted them they wouldn't help. Supper upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will blow your mind!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rc is fun to drive. It will pop wheelies and has plenty of torque. This is a fun rc for beginners or young kids. It will go thru grass, rocks, mud, and pretty much anything you through at it. Does come with 2 battery's and a adapter to run for about 35 to 45 mins depending on how you drive. I would recommend 👌 to anyone. I feel the price is a little high but if your looking for a small powerful rc this would be it. I will have a video of it on you tube channel look for Brandon's rc mania.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I got both this 1:20 car and also the 1:10 car by the same company (after not being able to decide, lol). They have different strengths and weaknesses. This smaller one is is better for indoors, is pretty much indestructible, but can only handle short grass (not really medium, and not long). The bigger 1:10 one can be damaged by high speed crashes, is quieter actually, and can handle tall grass just fine. Both can handle puddles, gravel, snow, sand. Reaaaally enjoy the adjustable speed sensitivity on the remote, for both. Batteries last as advertised, if not longer. Enjoy the video I made for fun :D
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: It meets all expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was go smacked the first time out. Amazing little bugger and faster than I imagined. I bought it for my Grandsons birthday who just turned six. I knew it might be a little to much for him but the reviews convinced me that it was tough and with adult supervision and a speed control knob separate from trigger I thought he would be able to grow into it. As it turns out he is somewhat of a natural and had a short learn curve. Only problem is he never wants to stop. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quick, once it works
customer_reviews.text: First Triton 1:20 was delivered pretty quickly but it never worked. Charged batteries and plugged them into the supplied multi battery plug and it smoked and never worked. Worked with customer support, who was responsive, and they engaged engineering. I didn't want to replace parts for a car that never worked so I just did an Amazon return and received a new working car in <48 hours. Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: apex_bob

customer_reviews.title: Wow...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday present, he will be 4. Unboxed it to make sure the batteries were charged for him while he was sleeping, I decided to try it out and play with it a little myself. Holy crap this thing is fast, I couldn't believe it, thing does a wheelie on carpet and flips itself over onto it's roof! Needless to say, I thought it was a bit too much for a 4 year old, and decided to keep this as mine and bought him one that hopefully goes slower, I haven't unboxed the new one yet...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Peck

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing car, on all aspects.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd rc car. This thing is incredibly powerful and also has a slower speed setting for beginners. It’s also surprisingly durable. One of our friends ran it over with her bike and it was still fine! The battery charging system is cool how it just carries both batteries. It’s a bit annoying to have to remove the shell each time though. For beginners, it will take a while to get used to it’s amazing speed and do alignment but you’ll figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: AmirM

customer_reviews.title: So fast and fun to drive
customer_reviews.text: So fast and fun the drive over anything. Works in snow, water, grass and rock easily. The whole family is able to drive it easily and have fun. Have a four because the clips to hold the body on to change battery are an annoying design and will be lost easily or bend. Also this is so small and lightweight with so much speed it flips easily onto the roof. Great value for money just wish it wouldn’t flip over so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Dont judge a book by its cover
customer_reviews.text: At first i was really disappointed on how amall the car was but shortly after we decided to give it a try and well it became a hit to our family and one of the best buys for my family. I have 5 boys and the 4 year old took to it so easy he even sleeps with it!!!!! Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome RC car
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these cars for my sons. They have spent hours playing with them. This car comes with two batteries so by the time they have used the battery in the car, the second one is charged. They can play with this car for as long as they want. They have taken this car both inside and outside and it has worked really well. Definite favorite!
customer_reviews.author: PC1

customer_reviews.title: 1st RC vehicle and Wow .. what fun :D
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted an RC vehicle and have always talked myself out of purchasing one and this last Christmas I was gifted your Triton 1:20 (Green) monster truck. I have had a ton of fun learning how to drive it and am very impressed with the range of the speed of this vehicle. I have only run into one issue and one of the rear springs keeps separating so I am looking through the replacement and other accessories for this vehicle. I would highly recommend this vehicle as it is easy to use and fun. I am looking forward to lots more trips to the park and possibly even some races. thanks again Bill Lounds Las Vegas NV
customer_reviews.author: Jinne Foess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but not as fast as advertised on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our friends 6 year old son. The absolutely loves it however it even says on the box that it does not go nearly as fast as the advertised speed on the Amazon ad. So that is the reason for the reduced star rating, we felt that there was some false advertising there.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Parawan

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER SMALL! However, my 8 year old has run this truck through the really wet mud, shallow water, grass, rock, gravel, hills, flips and everything in between. This truck takes all the abuse a boy could dish out and keeps ticking like a clock! Being so small is the only "downside". Super fast and offers endless entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bankston

customer_reviews.title: I’m 40 years old and I want one for myself!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s just awesome. It’s super fast turns on a dime has great range from the controller to the vehicle. You can adjust the steering so early power shifts to the left or to the right to compensate. It’s so fast It can do wheelies and flip it’s self over! Definitely worth the money and their customer service has been awesome with any questions I had! I’m editing this review after about a month or two. The thing is so fast and small. If you have the throttle turned all the way up and hit the gas. The damn thing flips over every time and you have to go get it. Kind of annoying. Other than that it’s bad ass.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Fast, fun and good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: So far so great. I have used it about 10 times now on carpet, asphalt and grass. This thing may be small but it is FAST. Batteries last a fairly long time. I never timed them but by the time I am through both I am ready to stop for that session. My kids also love it, although I turn the speed down for them. Only con was a strut was broke when I opened the package. I had to superglue it so the wheel actually had a spring/shock attached. I knocked off a star due to that. Glue has held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great little truck.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little truck. It is fast, durable, and the play time is longer than what we have become used to with other rc's. So far it does great on all terrain except grass. Being a smaller size rc the grass slows it down a little, but that was expected. One good thing is that if something breaks, you can get parts.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great RC Car Value and a Lot of Fun for Kids and Adults!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this car now for about 2 weeks and thru several charges we are getting at least 20 minutes per battery or more. With that said, we did not receive two USB chargers as noted in a recent communication from the manufacturer and are unable to use the included multi-battery adapter to minimize downtime - which isn't a huge deal, but takes time away from continuous use. If the manufacturer could comment on both of those items above, we'd be even more satisfied. Pro tip - stock up on pins! You will lose them thru use or just when taking the shell off for battery replacement.
customer_reviews.author: rjj130

customer_reviews.title: Very good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely for beginners. Heads up: if you are going to spend almost 100$ on this rc car, spend 50$ more and get a 1/10th redcat. Double the speed, double the size, double the battery life. Cheap and fun. This triton is fun but very cheap. It travels about 12-16 mph. Not alot of room for upgrades. Very good for people starting out hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Jake 2

customer_reviews.title: I've only had it for about a week now.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well put together and sturdy. Also with the 2 battery system it runs for quite a while, so extremely happy about that. I just wish it was a little bigger. Has a bit of a problem running in grass. It goes really fast for the size. I really like the speed control. On flat ground will go straight , but if any bumps what so ever it is all over the road. The price is pretty good at around $100. I would not recommend for really young kids under 10. I am satisfied with my purchase. And the friends that have seen it and used it are considering buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come charged, which was a let down and to charge it is a pain. It runs pretty well, but it's small and has trouble navigating more difficult terrain. I don't see myself using it often as the battery life is limited and the charging is such a pain. I wouldn't have bought it if I would have been able to give it a test run.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lavery

customer_reviews.title: Great car so far.
customer_reviews.text: My son has been having a blast with this item. It was smaller than expected but that's not a problem. It seem pretty durable and is pretty easy to operate. Would be nice if they would include a few more extra clips that hold the top piece on, but they are pretty cheap to buy at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. It comes with 2 rechargeable batteries which is nice so one can charge while you drive with the other one. It is 4wd and goes a pretty fast. He could drive it down the block with good range. He
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: These actually hurt my hand when I picked it up and the wheels wouldn’t stop spinning. I’m glad it was me and not my Grandson. They’re just not safe, they would go really fast without even touching the remote - scary.
customer_reviews.author: MVMitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great RC truck
customer_reviews.text: This thing is FAST. The battery lasts longer than you expect one to. We gifted this to our son for Christmas and he LOVES it. The only negative we see on it is the battery connectors, they don't fit inside the body very well. Still an excellent little car.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Vehicle : )
customer_reviews.text: We liked the easy setup and charging system. The simple controls and easy handling make it a great toy for not only us adults, but our young child as well! It is even quiet and small enough for our Furry family to be interested in instead of hiding.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Based on the video we watched, the truck looked to be a large like a Traxxas. We was expecting a huge truck. When it arrived it, we were extremely upset to see it was no bigger than my husband's hand. It didn't do anything that we saw on the video. Save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: DWAYNE A  ALLISON

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Little Trick
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described online by the company. Because of the two batteries this little truck is FAST. The headlights are rather decent, and it was great for my husband because he was learning and crashed a lot and it still survived.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good RC car for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great RC car for children. Simple construction with easy operation. The only real issue is the length of the battery wires is a little short when using both batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Commonly Malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a common problem amongst other owners of this item. First time taking this out, the remote and car lost connection. L and R controls completely functional, trim function and throttle function worked perfectly while the trigger was not responsive for FORWARD and BACKWARD. I went through all the troubleshooting i could think of and it was to no avail. Not worthy for purchasing for any price. I must say though, AMAZON completely too care of the situation without causing any grief. I will search for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good little car
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old wanted to use his birthday money for a remote control car. This is the one that he choose and he is very happy with it. The pins did fall out of the hoot fairly fast, but that could have been because they were played with? We replaced them with small safety pins and that has worked great. He has driven it since he got it and has loved it. I would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME!!
customer_reviews.text: AWSOME CAR!! The durability of the car is awsome!! You can run it on snow, Ice, gravel,carpet JUST about anything! Its not very big but it is VERY durable! #1 for durability!! 4WD is very handy too! One ba thing about this is it only has one charger and two batteries. I like that you can turn the speed up and down! Didn't know if I could trust it because of the reviews of the past few weeks. But I think it all depends on how there handled while shipping. Anyway, this is a VERY VERY VERY, AWSOME CAR! THANKS A BUNCH LAEGENDARY! :) :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Truck was fine. Wheel got broken accidentally. But trying to get a replacement parts like a new set of wheels and tires is impossible. Got for Christmas present. And it seems like I’m getting the run around. They wanted pictures I sent them pictures. And no there wanting more. Customer service needs to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Most of the RC cars that I purchase for my grandsons get broken in a relatively short period of time. This one is definitely more durable and is a better quality product. It arrived on time and continues to delight my grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Well built, good durable RC car
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old bought this and loves it. He has built jumps and taken it outside. It has handled all the different terrains well. He’s driven it off, I think accidentally, the height of a chair and it survived the fall. This RC car is extremely well built and easy for him to handle and control. He is very happy with his purchase and we will totally recommend this company and their RC cars to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it! It will not disappoint. Relive your childhood all over again
customer_reviews.text: I'm going on 29yrs old and I live this little truck! Pops wheelies climbs curbs and last at least 40mins. I threw a fpv camera on mine. I've never had this much fun with an RC car. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: KevMo

customer_reviews.title: Love the Triton RC car
customer_reviews.text: It far exceeded my child's expectation of an RC car. It is definitely fast and is more fun to drive. We have lost a few clips, so having extras on hand are highly recommended. Out of all the RC cars we have, this is by far the most exciting and durable one to own.
customer_reviews.author: ACSC

customer_reviews.title: Was awesome..until it broke.
customer_reviews.text: This car was awesome...until it broke. My son got it from the Easter bunny last month and it broke about 2 weeks ago. He used it for 2 weeks. No foul play at all, and the plastic underneath that holds one of the screws in place snapped. Super disappointed because this car wasn’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ginn

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo much fun!!! Feature packed! AWD!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but I honestly had no clue. I can’t believe the high speed & power, At full speed with dual batteries the power will flip itself over if you take off too quickly. I will be buying another. ——turn the speed down for kids
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Besaw

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: We love the car, my 3 year old toddler enjoying racing it, the only problem - after only few weeks one shock is already gone, just from using it around the house
customer_reviews.author: Foxycat

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but well worth the price, has run perfect from day one and I'm a little hard on it. Easy to charge and change the battery. Fast and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for end of the school year gifts. 1 worked for 10 minutes, it steers but doesnt run. The other one works intermittently. When they work they are fast and fun
customer_reviews.author: c cloman

customer_reviews.title: It’s small but good
customer_reviews.text: Now this was a lot smaller then I thought it would be but since it’s for my son it worked out well built and solid worth the money
customer_reviews.author: richard garrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car for my 7yr old son. He and I love this small little car. I like the fact it has lo/hi rate for the throttle. This car flies pretty fast through the lawn and on pavement. Honestly I think I play with this car more than my son!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Stop using Amazon nothing but China junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage doesn't work will be returning, Amazon should do a better job of vetting those who sell on here because slot of these products are garbage
customer_reviews.author: Mark wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Car, but don't get wet or muddy
customer_reviews.text: Driving the car in water that barely touches the bottom makes the car stop working. Once the car dries out, it works again for a short time. But, over time, (less than a month), ours has stopped working entirely. Electrical components must not be sealed well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money low quality and breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This car is 4-wheel drive, however after only 8 times using the car, the back wheels have quit working and ably the front wheels work. This pretty much renders the car useless in most conditions. Terrible durability and quality of construction. So disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: David Keith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Overall very nice bought for my special need brother .... very fast although has some issues with long range ....it is a bit small hard to take cover off .... the instructions aren't very clear but u figured out how to set up and charge
customer_reviews.author: DOLLIE Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great remote control monster truck
customer_reviews.text: I gave this truck to my 7 year old grandson for Christmas. He has been playing with it continuously since then. The truck is remarkably fast and easily climbs over all kinds of objects. His father has played with it too and now wants one!! Don't hesitate to buy this one. It is well built and performs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rabbio

customer_reviews.title: Fast/Quick/Powerful
customer_reviews.text: It came in a lot smaller than I thought, however this little dude packs some punch! It’s super fast, donuts galore, wheelies and turns and stops on a dime! I bought this for my 7 yr old for his birthday and it is honestly too fast for him. I am having more fun with it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gearing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Runs awesome. And I really appreciate how they emailed to make sure I received it on time and is was undamaged. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great car
customer_reviews.text: Great car for 8 year old. Smaller than I expected but fast and maneuverable and can take beating. Goes off jumps well too. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kimber

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, 7 year old able to control it well. Hard to plug into charger bc it’s hidden under car hood. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TBDrahos

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fun, fast, sturdy and excellent battery performance. I was skeptical and bought 2 just in case the first died. It never happened, the car was an absolute blast Christmas Day.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: This little RC car is really fun and fast for the price. Of you are a beginner or just get it as a gift for anyone they will enjoy it and have a lot of fun. Definitely will be scaling up to buy another one that's even better soon!
customer_reviews.author: Raina Crist

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for your dollar! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son really wanted a traxxas r/c car for Christmas but there was no way we were going to pay that much for a toy! This truck is amazing, incredibly durable, easy to control, budget friendly, and very fast! It exceeded our expectations and has been the perfect gift...our son said it’s his best r/c car ever! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BKD

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We open when we received, only to charge . One Christmas morning,he opened it and started driving right away. He was so happy, he took it outside,ran down the battery, recharged and whet back out. It goes very fast, and very easy to control. Thank you for his delight
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: And absolutely hauls butt!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the funnest little RC car I have ever played with in my life. you and your kids will have hours of fun playing with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs a pretty good punch for the size. Quality built my son is tough on his now we are looking for one for me!
customer_reviews.author: david chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend of mine and he really likes it. I thought it would be a little bigger but overall it is a decent buy. As for durability not sure yet he hasn't had it very long so we will see. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately was smaller than expected. I returned it because I wanted to get a bigger truck for my son. Price was good and quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Davy

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable and durable
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson is 11 years old and likes the r/c car. The clips are a little difficult for him, but with guidance he gets them. The battery lasts about 20-30 minutes depending on the terrain he drives on. He loves showing his cousin how it works (his cousin is 8).
customer_reviews.author: Teri Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new, sold as used without my knowledge
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a birthday present for my nephew. Body has scratches on fenders, its definitely used. The remote seems cheap and doesnt function. Not a new product, still can't use it due to the remote control not functioning properly. Now ill be more cautious buying rc cars on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jorden Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: well made and fun
customer_reviews.text: all I can say is this is a great deal this thing is awesome and a long run time comes with two batteries an you will love it
customer_reviews.author: shawn bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s ninth birthday. He absolutely loves it! We take it on our walks and he gets exercise because it goes pretty fast and he has to follow it.😀 every male, Young or old, comments on how awesome the toy is.
customer_reviews.author: Talinda Iverson

customer_reviews.title: A little problem
customer_reviews.text: Great little truck but smaller than the advertised size!! Thankfully everything else about it is great !!👍
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Good little car for the money
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this car. It's tough as nails she has put it to the test. Everyone in the family has played with it an has had a blast. I'm getting my self a bigger one lol
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fast & fun. It flips over quite a bit and the clear coat over the body wrap doesn’t last long. Mechanically sound for as much abuse as we’ve put it thru so far. Does donuts despite being 4 wheel drive. Goes thru mowed grass well. I’ll probably get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Hey You

customer_reviews.title: I think the wire harness is too short, and could be simplified. Nice truck over all, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the setup on the battery wire. Unnecessarily short, and could easily be simplified
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best R/C car I’ve ever bought. My son has the ability to break toys in the first 5 minutes however this car is going on a week of non stop use. Two batteries allow for constant play since one can charge while one is in use. Very fast and well put together battery lasts our through our evening walks and it can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Kids and grown men love this car
customer_reviews.text: Father and son both love this car. Great car. It’s fast and charges pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Brockelbank

customer_reviews.title: Made my 8 year old grandson very happy!
customer_reviews.text: He loves everything about it. The run time, the speed, the charge time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold the charge or move through grass as described. Power cuts in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRUCK
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is how the body is mounted to frame. The four little clips tend to come off during operation and get lost. I epoxied four short pieces of small chain to the body and attached clips to the chain so when the clips came out during operation they wouldn't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Flinck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome compact rc with speed and fast charging.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband. He loved that it is a compact rc and fast. He really loved that it has the USB connection to charge faster and it comes with 2 batteries. I glad I purchased the Triton 1:20 scale. I would like to see if it comes in a bigger version. But I'm glad my husband loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Estela Pharris

customer_reviews.title: Fast and furious
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and very powerful. Definitely would not let anyone younger than 12 use it at full speed. Even with trim all the way down, she goes! Seems durable and very portable, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fast and durable. It’s a bit smaller than I thought but it’s good for smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great little RC car. Fast, fun and durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little car. Its tons of fun, pretty fast and can take a beating and keep going. Survives my 3 year old, 7 year old, me and my dad! Fun for all!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, both broke
customer_reviews.text: Both of my sons purchased this same car with birthday money. Within a week, each car had broken. One of the rear wheel axels just broke. We were thinking by spending more money it would be better quality, but I guess that's not the case. Not worth $90+ dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Hootie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a small car but it drives like a bigger car
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This car is fast!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son. We were very surprised at how solidly built the car is and how fast it goes. A bonus is the second battery for extended play time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Car goes fast on flat ground, but if you are shifting from forward to reverse it takes a few second. Plastic quality is very poor the clear coat will come off after playing about 10-15 min.
customer_reviews.author: yevgine

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Floats like a butterfly stings like a bee. Very fast. Good maneuvering and steering. The wide base makes it harder to flip. A gift for our 7 year old who likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott McCracken

customer_reviews.title: awesome r/c vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car for myself because I bought a remote control car for my son for his birthday so we would have two vehicles to race against each other. So far I have enjoyed the vehicle very much so
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rc
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rc its fast and has alot of power love it
customer_reviews.author: Chris Braband

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts in remote
customer_reviews.text: Remote prattle was missing springs for battery to stay in place also took forever to get here! The truck is very powerful tho
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love it have stop playing with it
customer_reviews.author: ricky zarate

customer_reviews.title: 1st RC car
customer_reviews.text: Our first RC car for my son. Wasn’t sure what to expect. Super fun & amazing value! We recently purchased the 1:16 RC car as well. I’d recommend going for the 1:16 since more stable for beginners. Either choice you can’t go wrong, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ElCanadiense

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Love the car but we are having a hard time keeping the receiver connected. It bonds then loses it fairly quick. We are spending more time trying to connect than driving. Maybe I’m doing something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great and durable waterproof rc and is fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice and durable rc but after a while it starts making awkward sounds and sometimes if I hold down on the accelerator and then hit something it will continue to accelerate even when in off of the acceleration. Also I took it all apart and greased everything and it still makes that bad sounds
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: fast & fun
customer_reviews.text: gave as a gift to son. easy to use, fast and fun! and easy to charge (do not need to take batteries out of car, which is great). plastic body picks up scraps easy, but that just means it is getting played with (plus it should be easy to replace and I got the add-on protection through amazon so no worries)
customer_reviews.author: Jasper L.

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I just got it to day and the steering is messing up on it and I was expecting a little bit big rc but no babe me this baby you unhappy 😡 not worth 87.00 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: 🙂
customer_reviews.text: I have no quality issues..my son just didn't realize it was so small....returned unopened.....we will order from here in the future..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This car is junk
customer_reviews.text: It’s a piece of $#!+ the remote distance is maybe 10 feet and it stops and it doesn’t go very fast at all for the 3 seconds it actually drives b4 it’s too far away to get a signal and stops.
customer_reviews.author: christopher kleiber

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: These little trucks are a lot of fun. We bought 3 of them to race around the grass and street. We made jumps and we’re having. A blast. Def a great purchase. Thank you and have fun driving yours.
customer_reviews.author: D-DUB

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this RC car but if you have already had expierence with RC cars, you should get a traxxas RC car. This is mostly for beginners so I would rather have the laegendary sonic. Great RC car.
customer_reviews.author: ben anger

customer_reviews.title: This is fast and fun for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This was fun out of the box. I personally purchased 3 more batteries to insure uninterrupted joy. They are specifically designed to fit this specific cars' connections. Can't buy just any ol' batteries. Ran out in the rain. Still runs great. The car did a few unintentoinal flips, still running.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B. Tabat

customer_reviews.title: Fast. Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fast for the size. Battery life is good about 40 minutes with both batteries in it. And the delivery was fast. It only took a week to get it. Wish they had a bigger size like a 1/16 or 1/122 scale. But I highly recommend this truck. Lots of fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill T.

customer_reviews.title: Fair and fun
customer_reviews.text: Nice little rc car. Was a gift for my son. Seems durable however left front tie rod has popped off 2x now in 2 days. Not sure if its driver error.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

𝗨𝗦𝗘𝗥 𝗠𝗔𝗡𝗨𝗔𝗟 𝗨𝗣𝗗𝗔𝗧𝗘: Scroll down to “Technical Specification” section on this page to download the most recent User Manual. It contains 𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗢𝗥𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧 𝗜𝗡𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡

𝐌𝐎𝐑𝐄 𝐅𝐔𝐍 𝐖𝐈𝐓𝐇 𝐄𝐗𝐓𝐄𝐍𝐃𝐄𝐃 𝐑𝐔𝐍 𝐓𝐈𝐌𝐄: Equipped with 𝗧𝗪𝗢 𝗟𝗜-𝗣𝗢 𝟳.𝟰𝗩 𝟱𝟬𝟬𝗺𝗔𝗵 𝗥𝗘𝗖𝗛𝗔𝗥𝗚𝗘𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗕𝗔𝗧𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗦. The LAEGENDARY high speed remote control cars for boys and adults will run for up to 40 minutes. 𝗗𝗢𝗡’𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗢𝗣 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗙𝗨𝗡

𝐄𝐗𝐓𝐑𝐄𝐌𝐄 𝐓𝐈𝐑𝐄-𝐒𝐂𝐎𝐑𝐂𝐇𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐀𝐂𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍: With a 𝗕𝗥𝗨𝗦𝗛𝗘𝗗 𝗣𝗢𝗪𝗘𝗥𝗙𝗨𝗟 𝗕𝗨𝗜𝗟𝗧-𝗜𝗡 𝗠𝗢𝗧𝗢𝗥, our rc trucks 4x4 offroad waterproof come fully assembled, ready to run straight out of the box. It reaches speeds of up to 20 mph (30km/h), which makes the car race faster than some gas powered cars

𝐒𝐓𝐑𝐄𝐍𝐆𝐓𝐇 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐒𝐇𝐎𝐖-𝐒𝐓𝐎𝐏𝐏𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐋𝐎𝐎𝐊𝐒: The 4WD 1 20 SCALE remote control monster trucks boast extraordinary grip, operation and durability. The 𝗠𝗘𝗧𝗔𝗟 𝗦𝗛𝗢𝗖𝗞𝗦 and 𝗛𝗘𝗔𝗩𝗬 𝗗𝗨𝗧𝗬 𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗘𝗟𝗦 allows you to drive the LAEGEND rc car in all terrains like beach, sand, rock or concrete road
𝐌𝐀𝐍𝐄𝐔𝐕𝐄𝐑𝐀𝐁𝐈𝐋𝐈𝐓𝐘 𝐀𝐓 𝐈𝐓𝐒 𝐅𝐈𝐍𝐄𝐒𝐓: Thanks to the easy-to-use pistol-like 𝟮.𝟰𝗚𝗛𝗭 𝗥𝗔𝗗𝗜𝗢 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗧𝗘 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗥𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗘𝗥, our fast rc cars for kids and adults can be easily controlled within a range up to 200 feet

𝐏𝐄𝐑𝐅𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝐁𝐈𝐑𝐓𝐇𝐃𝐀𝐘 𝐎𝐑 𝐀𝐍𝐘 𝐎𝐂𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐆𝐈𝐅𝐓: If you are looking for an exciting and extra cool present, then you will love our LAEGENDARY radio controlled cars. You can race two or more rc off road cars at the same time, with no radio frequency interference.
